Job Description:
BS in Computer Science or related field

4+ years relevant work experience in the development,  integration,  deployment,  testing and support of enterprise- level software applications using Delphi

Experience with Web Services specifications (ex: XML,  SOAP,  Security,  Messaging,  Authentication,  Metadata exchange)

Experience developing Web Applications using JSP,  Java portlets (JSR 286),  EJB and Java Web Services

Experience delivering scalable systems

Knowledge of the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) and Service- Oriented Architecture (SOA Jax- WS)

Excellent verbal and written communication skills

Strong analytical problem- solving skills

Having experience in Delphi 10.1 (Berlin) is added advantage.

Having experience in DevExpress,  FireDAC,  Orheus,  TMS component pack,  TMS Flexcel,  Sharepoint Integrator,  Steema Teechart,  VirtualTree,  Weisse GANTT are added advantage.
